detaileddescription.para: Watchdog_CMD_* macros are general command codes for Watchdog_control(). Not all Watchdog driver implementations support these command codes.
WatchdogMSP432_CMD_* macros are command codes only defined in the WatchdogMSP432.h driver implementation and need to: #include<ti/drivers/watchdog/WatchdogMSP432.h>
